item.title: Burger Shack
item.description: A simple burger shop game. Idea by TacoShack Economy Discord Bot. Where you make / sell burgers and sell them. By time, you’ll have automation and create restaurant chain like McDonalds.

item.title: By the Sea
item.description: Sit by the sea with your friends online

item.title: Clippy
item.description: A quick clipboard for writing down quick notes. Todo Postgres / MongoDB Database Discord Bot with command to create a clip Web Client with Discord Auth for UID Format:

item.title: Communiquette
item.description: A website replacing the communication book of ITS. Teachers Writing daily reports Writing monthly reports Students Homework upload Image Manual writing

item.title: ITS 01
item.description: A web to remember and mark down the history of the first ITS class. Ideas Timeline of every people who left and joined

item.title: Just Trains
item.description: A study-like website to watch trains. Maybe explain how I love it and how good it is.

item.title: Language Documentation
item.description: A documentation for languages written in English. It will teach about that language in the same format. Documentation will be written like a library documentation.

item.title: Pat's Time Wheel
item.description: Display the time schedule of my day as a wheel. Maybe create this as a template for others to create.

item.title: Tell the Duck
item.description: A theraphy website. Idea by Rubber duck debugging - Wikipedia but instead of fixing your bugs, it’ll hopefully help with your sadness, stress, anxiety or whatever.

item.title: The Space
item.description: A cozy website with a fireplace and a clock. Kinda like a studying website but for people who are sad. Built from Pat’s desired ideal cozy place.

item.title: Untitled Train Game
item.description: A game inspired by the Netflix Series Snowpiercer What to do Basic Movement - Q/E Accelerate ZOOM Fast Movement World Map
